Organization.name: MediSync
Organization.description: Premium AI-powered healthcare BI and analytics platform.

SoftwareApplication.name: MediSync BI Platform
SoftwareApplication.featureList: Real-time healthcare analytics, Tally ERP integration, PII protection, AI-driven insights

acceptedAnswer.text: MediSync is an advanced AI-powered business intelligence platform specifically designed for hospitals and healthcare providers to sync and analyze data from Tally ERP and HIMS.

mainEntity.name: How does MediSync ensure data privacy?

acceptedAnswer.text: MediSync uses built-in PII protection layers and secure Tally XML integrations to ensure all healthcare data remains compliant and protected.
